![](https://amd.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/460/2024/09/TRANSKRIP-SAMPLE.png "TRANSKRIP SAMPLE")



### Online Application (UTMTrAS)

Apply the academic transcript via UTM Transcript Application System (UTMTrAS). Please make sure you are enrolled on year 2000 onwards.

[UTMTrAS System](http://academic.utm.my/transcript/index.asp)



### Application Form

Manual Form Application is for graduates that was enrolled before year 2000. Please provide the complete form with online payment receipt through **[Payhub UTM](https://payhub.utm.my/payment/cart/68d7bdcf38819d71d0de45c59679eb7c)
** when submit the application.

[Manual Form](https://amd.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/sites/460/2024/06/Permohonan-Transkrip-manual.pdf)
